tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We visited Dr. Ajith Prabhu for a second opinion about the hip bone joint replacement of my Father in law and were very much satisfied with the consultation. Few positive things about him are as below.
1. First of all he is a good human being (may sound silly for some people but this is one of the prime reasons why we went for a second opinion) 
2.  He explains the situation very clearly in a layman's language which helped us in taking further decisions.
3. Helped us in understanding Pros and Cons of the operation very clearly.
4. Very down-to-earth person.
5. He knows what he is doing and speaks what he knows.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a good experience. Doctor explained the issue very well , did proper diagnosis, gave sufficient time to answer all my questions,  and was very courteous and friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience, Dr. Ajit is very understanding and helpful and kind. Must recommended for all reading this post.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very much impressed with the explanation of the problem,doctors treatment,friendliness.Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very homely and understanding. First doctor who told me not to come back! As I will be ok soon. Very very happy!

tags: None
review: Had ACL complete tear, Dr Ajith explained the issue in detail seeing MRI, suggested surgery, did the surgery exceptionally well and suggest post op procedures. Its 4 months on and my left leg is 95% close to normal. In Another 2 months I am looking to get back on play mode. Highly Recommended doctor.
